summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the ascertaining of certain specified particular and specific facts and procuring of certain specified specific data upon which the official action of the City Council upon certain specified pending questions is to depend, directing certain city officials to proceed to Portland, Oregon, in order to effectuate such purpose; authorizing expenditures and appropriating money therefor and (such purpose not having been specified in any tax levy or official estimate) declaring the emergency making necessary such appropriating and declaring an emergency.
